summary:
I already had an interest in computer science during my bachelor at the VU Amsterdam. After my first year I noticed that I needed more of a challenge and during my second year of Business Analytics I started the bachelor Computer Science next to giving working lectures (and my other bachelor). I think this explains a lot about my personality. I need to be challenged in multiple ways to keep my interest, only then I can excel. 

At the beginning of my career I worked at quite some companies as a data analyst. After 1,5 - 2 years I lost the challenge that I need and moved again. I notice now within the product owner position that I get the variety of discussions, the complexity of changes and the room to create and carry out a vision. That's also what I am looking for in a next position.

What I value in ING is that it is very diverse and that you are really encouraged to grow and not to keep doing what you have been doing.

If you have a position that will help me take the next step in my career, feel free to contact me :).

projects.title: TripTeaze @ Dutch Open Hackaton 2015
projects.description: You've taken two weeks off and you want to get out and travel. But where do you go? You have some ideas about what you would like to do, but how do you find the perfect trip? We match your spoken holiday thoughts to the best flight destinations. We base our recommendation on your wishes, your budget and your agenda.

projects.title: Master Thesis (Msc. Business Analytics)
projects.description:
This thesis has been written as the final part of the master program Business Analytics at the VU University in Amsterdam. Business Analytics is a multi-disciplinary program consisting of applied mathematics, economics and computer science. 

During my internship, I focused on what insights network analysis can give in the context of the business areas of Deloitte. Which business issues, viewed from multiple network representations, can be solved with network analysis? Furthermore, I have developed and implemented a couple of these combinations, for the others I have described how they should be addressed.

projects.title: Research Paper (Msc. Business Analytics)
projects.description: This research paper is part of the Master's program of Business Analytics. I researched the topic of graph mining (network analysis) in combination with outlier detection. To test the techniques of graph mining, I used the email network of the Enron email dataset.

projects.title: Bachelor Graduation Project (Bsc. Business Analytics)
projects.description: The final project of the Bachelor Business Analytics; The Business Case. We have helped the NS analyzing the OV-Chipkaart data with a group of five students. Our main goal was to predict the precise route a traveller has taken from the check-in station to check-out station. So that the NS could allocate their trains more precisely.

contributors.headline: Lead Credit Analytics at ABN AMRO

projects.title: Bachelor Graduation Project (Bsc. Computer Science)
projects.description: This is the final project of the Bachelor Computer Science. The project is about the relation between normal romantic proofs and mechanical Coq (proof assistant) proofs. The project consists of a part research and the writing of a paper about the literature and the research.

profile_positions.description:
The squad Analytical Engine provides functional support for Cognos Analytics and PowerBI for ING globally.

My ambition is to provide the best customer experience in a secure, efficient and reliable way.

Some things that I do:
- Ambassador for visualisation tools within ING
- Support on high-level dilemmas within tribes on visualisation
- Optimizing way of working to perform better and more efficiently
- Leading 5 engineers and 3 data analysts
- Creating vision on data fluency and self-service
- Working together with ING group to create one platform
- Handling risk items regarding data leakage
profile_positions.title: Product Owner Data visualisation tooling

profile_positions.description: I helped the tribe Mortgages with analysis on for example retention of customers. I focused my second year within the squad on redesigning and rebuilding the reporting ecosystem to make sure that we created the right reports in the right way. In this process I focused a lot on the UX experience and maintainability of the reports.

profile_positions.title: Data Specialist

profile_positions.description:
Jibes provides knowledge capabilities to deliver the most appropriate solution for governing and managing your critical data assets within and beyond the enterprise. Primarily to support you in the full utilization of information as a strategic asset. Key words are Master Data Management, Big Data Analytics, Data Integration & Governance.

The end user is paramount. ‘I have lots of data, but no information!’. Working with Jibes is as pragmatic and dynamic as the world of today. 100% tailored to your needs. Professional services, knowledge transfer or full service turn-key projects.
